query admins ( $accountID:ID! $limit:Int $from:Int $search:String $sortInput:[SortInput] $adminIDs:[ID!]) {
	admins ( accountID:$accountID limit:$limit from:$from search:$search sort:$sortInput adminIDs:$adminIDs ) {
		items {
			id
			version
			role
			firstName
			lastName
			email
			creationDate
			modifyDate
			status
			passwordNeverExpires
			mfaEnabled
			nativeAccountID
			allowedItems {
				id
				name
				type
			}
			presentUsageAndEvents
			managedRoles {
				role {
					id
					name
					description
					isPredefined
				}
				allowedEntities {
					id
					name
					type
				}
				allowedAccounts
			}
			resellerRoles {
				role {
					id
					name
					description
					isPredefined
				}
				allowedEntities {
					id
					name
					type
				}
				allowedAccounts
			}
			adminType
		}
		total
	}	
}
